text: Calera is a city in Shelby and Chilton counties in the U.S. state of Alabama. The population was 16,494 at the 2020 census. ==Population== From 2000 to 2010, the population more than tripled to 11620, making it the fastest-growing city in Alabama. == References == == Other websites == * City of Calera official website Category:1880s establishments in Alabama Category:1887 establishments in the United States Category:Cities in Alabama
title: Calera, Alabama
